name: Post Ghost
description:
It's time to deliver some spooky letters to the ghosts in the neighborhood. 

They've been waiting for a long time to hear from their friends and family. Avoid obstacles and angry ghost doggies to make sure they get the right letters.

CONTROLS

Use WASD to move around, left mouse button allows you to throw the letters, right mouse button allows you to change the type of letter you're sending.

Ludum Dare 48 - Deeper and deeper

Artists Brayan OIiveira and Luiza Muller

Musician Vinicius Costa

Programmers Aline Kaiper and Henrique Lima
